CustomField.formula:
HYPERLINK("http://maps.google.com/maps?f=q&hl=en&q= "&Home_Service__r.Street__c &" "& Home_Service__r.City__c &" "&
Home_Service__r.State__c &" "& Home_Service__r.Zip__c, Home_Service__r.Street__c +' '+ Home_Service__r.City__c +' '+
Home_Service__r.State__c +' '+ Home_Service__r.Zip__c )
CustomField.label: Link Customer Address
